top.title: Try a free demo of Big Brain Acadmey: Brain vs Brain and create your own house rules
top.info: Battle to see who has the brawniest brain in the Big Brain Academy™: Brain vs. Brain game for the Nintendo Switch™ system. But before the game releases on Dec. 3, you can download the free demo to get started on some of the fun activities!

top.title: New game releases and reveals from the League of Legends universe
top.info: The League of Legends universe, the world of Runeterra, has a vast amount of lore and stories to tell. And for the first time, these stories are coming to the Nintendo Switch™ system.

bottom.title: Tips to get a strong start in the free Metroid Dread demo
Near or far, you can gather the crew for multiplayer fun!
Try a free demo of Big Brain Academy: Brain vs. Brain and create your own house rules
